section1.title: 1. General provisions
section1.content: These Terms of Service govern the relationship between the online store and users of the site. By using our store services, you agree to these terms. All products and services are provided in accordance with current legislation.

section2.title: 2. Ordering process
section2.content: To place an order, you need to add items to your cart and complete the checkout process. We reserve the right to change product prices without prior notice. An order is considered placed after receiving email confirmation.

section3.title: 3. Payment and delivery
section3.content: We accept various payment methods: credit cards, e-wallets, cash on delivery. Delivery is carried out by courier service or Russian Post within 1-5 business days. Exact delivery times depend on your region.

section4.title: 4. Returns and exchanges
section4.content: You can return items within 14 days of receipt if they have not been used and retain their original condition. To return, you must fill out an application and attach a receipt. Refunds are issued using the same payment method used for purchase.

section5.title: 5. Privacy
section5.content: We guarantee the confidentiality of your personal data in accordance with Federal Law No. 152-FZ. Your data is used solely for order processing and is not shared with third parties without your consent.

section6.title: 6. Contact information
section6.content: For any questions, you can contact us by phone +7 (XXX) XXX-XX-XX or email info@yourstore.com. Support service hours: 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM, seven days a week.
